name: Yawning Face
baseMeaning: A face with closed eyes and an open mouth, yawning with a hand covering it.
tldr: Sleepy, tired, or bored. Can also imply something is uninteresting.

contextMeanings.meaning: Actually feeling sleepy or ready for bed.
Showing disinterest or that something isn't impressive.
Indicating a boring meeting or tiredness at work.

platformNotes.note: Often used to dismiss unimpressive takes or drama.
Used in late night or early morning posts.
Can indicate long meetings or tiredness at work.

generationalNotes.note: Frequently used to dismiss or show disinterest.
Used for tiredness or subtle boredom.
Usually interpreted literally as being sleepy.

warnings.title: Can seem dismissive
warnings.description: Using this in response to someone can come across as rude or dismissive.
